page.title: 06Ashton Park-Recreation
page.content: Ashton Park is a residential area. The amenities it offers are two bowling greens, two football pitches, four tennis courts, one putting green, two playgrounds and a sand pit. We asked a sample of forty adults how they use Ashton Park. Walking was the most popular pastime with tennis coming second. Third was putting and then came bowling. Some people just sat down in the Park or went jogging there. We also asked forty children what they used Ashton Park for. Nearly half played football, a fifth played tennis and exactly half liked putting. All of them played on the fields and all of them played in the playground and nearly all of them played in the sand pit.
